response.original_title: World Tour To Cat Four - The Sports Director (Part Two)
response.overview: How hard is it to win a bike race?  In the summer of 2021 GCN+ decided to find out by putting together seven strong local cyclists to train and race as a team under the leadership of EF Education-NIPPO sports director Tom Southam.  Can ‘Worldtour’ Tom whip these ‘Cat Four’ riders into a race-winning machine? And how can they work together, knowing there’s a selection process for the final road race that will leave two riders left out of the team?  In part two, the riders compete together as a team for the first time at a series of circuit races. As the action hots up and the pressure builds, Tom makes the difficult team selection ahead of the final road race.
response.title: World Tour To Cat Four - The Sports Director (Part Two)

results.name: WORLD TOUR TO CAT FOUR – THE SPORTS DIRECTOR | PART TWO
